...and blunt too!

* IR spat another sprey of acid at FireBlade, growling and getting ready to 
jump ahead, suddenly hearing something heavy hit the ground a little ways 
behind her.
It could be an enemy!
She whipped her head around and glared at Prowl for a sec, though he'd just 
landed. She was sure that his beast mode would be in controle again but had 
hopes that he might actually be able to talk to her, maybe getting a little 
more controle this time.
But to her utter shock he began to bend down and try to sniff her but she 
sidles out of the way intime with a dirty look on her face and hissed at 
him, turning her face towards FireBlade again.
< How rude! I'm going to talk to him after I beat some sense into him for 
this!>*
